TITLE.P: Development of a National Data Portal and Content Creation Services — T008/17

SHORT_DESCR.P: The development of the National Data Portal is driven by the need of Government to facilitate the sharing of data across public administration and to open-up data which is not of a sensitive or personal nature. This is described in the Digital Malta 2014-2020 Action 32 which states that the Government shall make the public-sector information available to all as mandated by law. Furthermore, this project will lead towards the attainment of a single person and address register that will ultimately consolidate person and address instances. This procurement shall be divided into three (3) lots. The project shall be part-financed by the European Regional Development Fund, Co-financing rate: 80 percent European Union; 20 percent National Funds in accordance with the rules of the Operational Programme I — European Structural and Investment Funds 2014-2020 programme.
